description: Redevelopment to provide 66 residential units (26 one bedroom, 34 two bedroom, 6 three bedroom) along with associated parking and alterations to park boundaries and other boundaries. Applicants Plan Nos:2792/P1B-P5B,P6C,P7B,P8B.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
